title: Restrained
excerpt: A restrained creature's speed becomes 0. Attack rolls against it have Advantage, its attack rolls have Disadvantage, and it has Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
markdown: # Restrained While you have the Restrained condition, you experience the following effects: * **Speed 0.** Your Speed is 0 and can't increase. * **Attacks Affected.** Attack rolls against you have Advantage, and your attack rolls have Disadvantage. * **Saving Throws Affected.** You have Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
